t: Brand metrics | Amazon Ads
s: 5 days ago - New-to-brand metrics determine whether an ad-attributed sale was made by an existing customer or by one buying your product on Amazon for the first time in the last year. Metrics include total new-to-brand purchases and sales, new-to-brand purchase rate, and cost per new-to-brand customer.
